00027 namespace detail {

00029 void sqr(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n) {
00030     const digit_t *ndigits = n._get_digits();
00031     size_t nlen = n._get_length();
00032 
00033     integer r;
00034     r._realloc(nlen * 2 + 1);
00035     digit_t *rdigits = r._get_writable_digits();
00036 
00037     // Calculate the product of digits of unequal index
00038     size_t i = 0;
00039     doubledigit_t c;
00040     do {
00041         const doubledigit_t ii = ndigits[i];
00042         const digit_t *jp = ndigits + i + 1;
00043         digit_t *rp = rdigits + i + (i + 1), *rpe = rdigits + i + nlen;
00044 
00045         c = 0;
00046         while (rp < rpe) {
00047             doubledigit_t t = ii * *jp++ + *rp + c;
00048             *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00049             c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00050         }
00051         *rp = static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00052     } while (++i < nlen - 1);
00053 
00054     // Multiplication of inner products by two
00055     c = 0;
00056     digit_t *rp = rdigits + 1, *rpe = rdigits + (2 * nlen) - 1;
00057     do {
00058         doubledigit_t t = (doubledigit_t(*rp) << 1) + c;
00059         *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00060         c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00061     } while (rp < rpe);
00062     *rp = static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00063 
00064     // Addition of inner squares
00065     const digit_t *ip = ndigits, *ipe = ndigits + nlen;
00066     rp = rdigits;
00067     c = 0;
00068     do {
00069         doubledigit_t t = doubledigit_t(*ip) * *ip + *rp + c;
00070         *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00071         c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00072 
00073         t = c + *rp;
00074         *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00075         c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00076     } while (++ip < ipe);
00077     *rp += static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00078 
00079     r._cleanup();
00080     target._attach(r);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void pow(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, const base_integer& e) {
00084     if (e._is_zero()) {
00085         // Anything to the zeroth power is one.
00086         target._set_unsigned(1);
00087         return;
00088     } else if (!e._is_zero() && e._get_negative()) {
00089         // Anything to a negative power is a fractional value, which an integer
00090         // library can't represent.
00091         target._set_unsigned(0);
00092         return;
00093     }
00094 
00095     bool neg=(!n._is_zero() && n._get_negative() && (e._get_digit(0) & 0x01));
00096 
00097     size_t length=e._get_length(), lastBitCount=0;
00098     digit_t ee(e._get_digit(length-1));
00099     while (ee != 0) { ee >>= 1; ++lastBitCount; }
00100 
00101     temp_t p(n);
00102     p._set_negative(false);
00103 
00104     // If target is a fixed integer, we want to calculate using the same
00105     // limitations on intermediate values.
00106     temp_t answer(target, 1);
00107     answer._set_unsigned(1);
00108     for (size_t eIndex=0; eIndex < length; ++eIndex) {
00109         digit_t eee(e._get_digit(eIndex));
00110 
00111         int bitCount(int(eIndex == length-1 ? lastBitCount : bits_per_digit));
00112         while (bitCount-- > 0) {
00113             if (eee & 0x01) multiply(answer, answer, p);
00114             sqr(p, p);
00115             eee >>= 1;
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     answer._set_negative(neg);
00120     target._attach(answer);
00121 }
00122 
00123 void factorial(base_integer& target, size_t n) {
00124     // If target is a fixed integer, we want to calculate using the same
00125     // limitations on intermediate values.
00126     temp_t answer(target, 1);
00127     answer._set_unsigned(1);
00128 
00129     fixed_integer_any nn(n);
00130     while (nn > 1) {
00131         multiply(answer, answer, nn);
00132         nn._decrement();
00133     }
00134 
00135     target._attach(answer);
00136 }

00138 } // namespace detail

00152 integer pow2(size_t e) {
00153     integer r;
00154     setbit(r, e);
00155     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00156 }
00157 
00168 integer sqr(const integer& n) {
00169     integer r;
00170     detail::sqr(r, n);
00171     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00172 }
00173 
00182 integer pow(const integer& n, const integer& e) {
00183     integer r;
00184     detail::pow(r, n, e);
00185     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00186 }

00201 integer factorial(size_t n) {
00202     integer r;
00203     detail::factorial(r, n);
00204     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00205 }
